Package org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.sitraka

Class Summary
CovBase Base class that deals with JProbe version incompatibilities.
Coverage Runs Sitraka JProbe Coverage.
Coverage.Finalsnapshot  
Coverage.Javavm  
Coverage.Recordfromstart  
CovMerge Runs the snapshot merge utility for JProbe Coverage.
CovReport Runs the JProbe Coverage 3.0 snapshot merge utility.
CovReport.ReportFormat  
CovReport.ReportType  
Filters Filters information from coverage, somewhat similar to a FileSet.
Filters.Exclude  
Filters.FilterElement an includes or excludes element
Filters.Include  
ReportFilters Filters information from coverage, somewhat similar to a FileSet.
ReportFilters.Exclude concrete exclude class
ReportFilters.FilterElement default abstract filter element class
ReportFilters.Include concrete include class
Socket Define a host and port to connect to if you want to do remote viewing.
StringUtil String utilities method.
Triggers Trigger information.
Triggers.Method A trigger for the coverage report
XMLReport Little hack to process XML report from JProbe.
